Description:
Required skills to be successful: Highly motivated with an ability to handle work pressure and to meet tight deadlines.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with high customer service orientation.
Excellent time management and organization skills.
Excellent computer skills.
Excellent written & spoken English and Arabic (preferable).
Problem-solving abilities What equips you for the role: More than 10 Years of experience as an HR Generalist and Specialist.
University degree.
Knowledge of SAP system 
Have worked in compensation and benefits area including payroll administration 
Interpersonal and negotiations skills.Job Details
